tool_description: Torrent Search Engine with Extratorrents, Piratebay,  and ISOhunt
name: Torrent Search
title: Torrent Search

api_list.name: All

required_parameters.name: query
required_parameters.description: Search Text (Title of the torrent to search)

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://theoneappkh-onetorrent-v1.p.rapidapi.com/torrent?query=Arrow"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "theoneappkh-onetorrent-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://theoneappkh-onetorrent-v1.p.rapidapi.com/torrent?query={query}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "theoneappkh-onetorrent-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Magnet Link (isoHunt)
api_list.description: Get Magnet Link from Link of isoHunt

required_parameters.name: url
required_parameters.description: input link params from the isoHunt object

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://theoneappkh-onetorrent-v1.p.rapidapi.com/torrent/magnet?url=https://isohunt.to/torrent_details/17626510/The-Flash-2014-S03E04-HDTV-x264-LOL-ettv"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "theoneappkh-onetorrent-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://theoneappkh-onetorrent-v1.p.rapidapi.com/torrent/magnet?url={url}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "theoneappkh-onetorrent-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
